howItWorks.title: How Grantfinder Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Class has a dynamic set of teaching tools built to
howItWorks.step1_description: Class has a dynamic set of teaching tools built to be deployed and used during class. Teachers can handout assignments in real-time for students to complete and submit.
howItWorks.image_alt: Illustration of books, apple, and stationery
howItWorks.step2_description: Easily launch live assignments, quizzes, and tests. Student results are automatically entered in the online gradebook.
howItWorks.step2_alt: Illustration of quiz or online gradebook
howItWorks.step3_description: Class provides tools to help run and manage the class such as Class Roster, Attendance, and more. With the Gradebook, teachers can review and grade tests and quizzes in real-time.
howItWorks.step4_description: Teachers and teacher assistants can talk with students privately without leaving the Zoom environment.
howItWorks.step4_alt: Illustration of downloading a scholarship PDF

scholarshipFeatures.sectionSubtitle: TOTC is one powerful online software suite that combines all the tools needed to run a successful school or office.

features.title: Answer all the Quizzes
features.description: Simple and secure control of your organization's financial and legal transactions. Send customized invoices and contracts.

features.title: Pay and Prepare Scholarship list
features.description: Schedule and reserve classrooms at one campus or multiple campuses. Keep detailed records of student attendance.

features.title: Get Your Personalized scholarship list in pdf
features.description: Automate and track emails to individuals or groups. Skillline's built-in system helps organize your organization.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Still have questions? Contact our team via

items.question: Can I enroll in multiple courses at once?
items.answer: You can enroll in multiple courses simultaneously and access them at your convenience.

items.question: What kind of support can I expect from instructors?
items.answer: Our instructors are dedicated to your success. You can expect timely responses to your questions, detailed feedback on assignments, and regular office hours for one-on-one support.

items.question: Are the courses self-paced or do they have specific start and end dates?
items.answer: Most of our courses are self-paced, allowing you to learn at your own speed. However, some specialized programs may have fixed start and end dates to facilitate group projects and live sessions.

items.question: Are there any prerequisites for the courses?
items.answer: Prerequisites vary by course. Each course description clearly outlines any prior knowledge or skills required. We also offer foundational courses to help you meet these prerequisites if needed.

items.question: Can I download the course materials for offline access?
items.answer: Yes, most course materials, including lectures, readings, and assignments, are available for download so you can access them offline at your convenience.

cta.title: Fast, simple, and ready for apply scholarships.
cta.description: No paperwork, no long processes. Just 5 minutes and you're ready to go.

privacy.title: Privacy <0>Policy</0>
privacy.intro: Thank you for visiting [Your Website Name] (“we”, “our”, “us”). Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit or interact with our website [www.yourwebsite.com] (the “Site”).

1.title: 1. Information We Collect
1.intro: We may collect the following types of information:
items: Personal Information: such as your name, email address, phone number, etc. (only when you submit it voluntarily, e.g., through contact forms or account registration).
Usage Data: including your IP address, browser type, device type, pages visited, time spent on the site, and other analytical data.
Cookies and Tracking Technologies: we may use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and improve our services.

2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
2.intro: We may use your information for the following purposes:
items: To provide and maintain our website.
To respond to your inquiries or provide customer support.
To send you updates, newsletters, or marketing communications (you can opt out).
To analyze and improve the performance and content of our site.
To detect and prevent fraudulent or illegal activity.

3.title: 3. Sharing Your Information
3.intro: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your information with:
items: Service Providers: who assist in operating our site or servicing you.
Legal Authorities: if required by law or to protect our legal rights.

4.title: 4. Your Rights and Choices
4.intro: You may have the right to:
items: Access the personal data we hold about you.
Request correction or deletion of your data.
4.contact: To exercise any of these rights, contact us at: youremail@grantfinder.com

5.title: 5. Security
5.text: We take reasonable precautions to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

6.title: 6. Third-Party Links
6.text: Our website may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for their privacy practices or content.

7.title: 7. Children's Privacy
7.text: Our services are not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children.

8.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
8.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Effective Date."

9.title: 9. Contact Us
9.text: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: youremail@grantfinder.com | Your Address, City, Country

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question? Reach out to us!
